Posts.Content: Dx with bc in 05,on hormanol treatmet,mets to spine. Anybody with mets bc doing good from going to Cancer Treatment Centers of America? Are there treatments any different, with my kind of cancer? Please any advice. Mostly every thing I read, 12 to 24 months, my doc also agreed. He also said don't give up hope new treatmets every day, they will find a cure in 5-10yrs. I am on tamifen, zomata, zolidex. tina
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Mets to Bone Treatments

Posts.Content: I hate feeling this way, asking god what did I do to deserve this, who did I ever hurt, why me. Any body else have same feeling? Maybe it’s the early menopause at 36 kicking in, or the drugs I take every morning, tamixfen, oxys, oxcoden for mets to spine. I feel horrible what my family is going through, they just don’t know what mood I will be in, crying or xxxxx y, numb feeling. Don’t know if it is meds, or dx bc with mets in spine...
Posts.Title: What Did i Do, to Get Cancer
